name: Afraid Of The Dark (nategrabowski)
description:
Instructions (scroll down for hints)

Heart rate is always going up unless in a SunSpot. Find the hearts to leave the Dark Forest and progress!

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move.

  • Avoid Ghosts or kill them with sunlight
  • Blue Sunspots mean you're close to a heart
  • Finding a heart brings you to the next stage
  • 300 heartrate will kill you and reset your level!

This was made in 1 week for the ZenoJam6 game jam!

Hints (do not read)

Since I didn't get a chance to implement some of the features to make the game easier I will give you some hints

  1.  The first level the heart location is North of spawn
  2. The second level the heart is West of spawn. The heart is located on a ledge in-between some trees.
